abstract: Arguing in favor of just a little screen time for your very little one.
snippet: Arguing in favor of just a little screen time for your very little one.
lead_paragraph: Should babies watch TV? Of course, the American Academy of Pediatrics says no. But does "no" really mean no watching the Republican presidential debate while you nurse the baby, or locking the toddler out of the room while the kindergartner watches "Dora the Explorer"?

headline.main: Is a Little TV Really That Bad for Babies?
